column2: title=Essays and Studies by Members of the English Association

column1: '''''Essays and Studies'' (1929)''' is a collection of essays (vol. 14, [[1929]]) of the series ''Essays and Studies by Members of the English Association''. It includes the essay '[[Ancrene Wisse and Hali Mei√∞had]]' (pp.[104]-126) by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
The collection was reprinted (hardback) in [[1966]] by Wm. Dawson & Sons.
*[http://archive.org/details/essaysandstudies030169mbp ''Essays And Studies'' Vol XIV (1929)] at Archive.org
